name: Rapture Rejects
description: The Rapture Has Happened. You didn't make the cut. Rapture Rejects is a top down isometric last man standing game set in the apocalyptic Cyanide & Happiness universe.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 and up Processor: i3 and up Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GT860 and up Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1 GB available space
